Class AgileWaitingStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.core.dispatch.wait.AgileWaitingStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WaitingMood, reactor.jarjar.com.lmax.disruptor.WaitStrategy

    public final class AgileWaitingStrategy
extends Object
implements reactor.jarjar.com.lmax.disruptor.WaitStrategy, WaitingMood
    A pair of slow and fast wait strategies to dynamically adapt to a given application load
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Stephane Maldini
